name: Albert Einstein, Physicist
quote: A calm and modest life brings more happiness than the pursuit of success combined with constant restlessness.

name: Stephen Kellogg, Singer
quote: It’s better to be at the bottom of the ladder you want to climb than at the top of the one you don’t.

name: Anne Sweeney, President
quote: Define success on your own terms, achieve it by your own rules, and build a life you’re proud to live.

name: Anonymous
quote: Take risks: if you win, you will be happy; if you lose, you will be wise.

name: Ezra Pound, Poet
quote: No man understands a deep book until he has seen and lived at least part of its contents.

name: Indira Gandhi, Indian Prime Minister
quote: You must learn to be still in the midst of activity and to be vibrantly alive in repose.

name: James Barrie, Novelist
quote: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.

name: Jeff Bezos, Entrepreneur
quote: We didn’t ascend from our hunter-gatherer days by being satisfied.
